attributes.action: Government to honour pledge to give Votes for Life by next General Election
attributes.additional_details:
https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/manifesto2015/ConservativeManifesto2015.pdf
See Page 49, paragraph headed: ‘We will protect our electoral system, to safeguard our democracy’
https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/a-democracy-that-works-for-everyone-chris-skidmore-speech
Speech by Constitution Minister, Chris Skidmore, MP, on 24 October 2016, see paragraph 13 starting ‘Recently, I restated ….’
attributes.background: Minister for the Constitution, Chris Skidmore, MP, on 24 October 2016 stated: 'If you were born in the UK, or have been a citizen living in the UK, then by the next general election, you will have an inalienable right to decide your country’s future'
